aboutus.title: About us
text: Video lectures are a widely used learning tool. They can supplement or even replace classroom lectures. They offer learners and teachers greater flexibility in time and space. A video recording studio was set up in the THB Economics Department in 2015. Many courses are already supplemented today with video lectures, which are directly integrated via Moodle. eLectures@THB is intended to make these lectures findable and accessible in a structured way. It is supported by the project "Vielfalt in Studium und Lehre" (VSL) at the THB.
Prof. Dr. Vera Meister is in charge of the technical and conceptual management. The software development and the maintenance of the video-lab is carried out by dedicated student assistants.
Since mid 2020 we are working on an improved website oft he original version, which was called „fbwtube“. The new website uses semantic technologies and is an overall improved website.

privacy.title: Privacy policy

dataprotection.title: Data protection
text: As a website operator, we take the protection of all personal data very seriously. All personal information is treated confidentially and in accordance with the legal requirements, as explained in this privacy policy.

Our website can, of course, be used without you providing any personal data. However, if at any time personal data such as name, address or e-mail is requested, this will be done on a voluntary basis. Never will data collected by us be passed on to third parties without your specific permission.
Data transmission on the Internet, such as via e-mail, can always have security gaps. Complete protection of data is not possible on the Internet.

InfDelBlo.title: Information, deletion, blocking
InfDelBlo.text: At any time you can inform yourself about the personal data, their origin and recipient and the use of the data processing and request free of charge a correction, blocking or deletion of this data. Please use the contact channels indicated in the imprint for this purpose. We are also available at any time to answer any further questions you may have on this subject.
